div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Flag|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `Flag` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Flag`. Element `Flag` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag`.
Element `Flag.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.meta`.
Element `Flag.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.implicitRules`.
Element `Flag.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.language`.
Element `Flag.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.text`.
Element `Flag.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.contained`.
Element `Flag.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.identifier`.
Element `Flag.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.status`.
Element `Flag.category` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.category`.
Element `Flag.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.code`.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.subject`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Flag.subject` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Flag.subject` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.subject`.
Element `Flag.period` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.period`.
Element `Flag.encounter` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.encounter`.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.author`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Flag.author` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Flag.author` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.author`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

comment.value: FHIR R5 Resource `Flag` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Flag`. Element `Flag` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag`.
Element `Flag.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.meta`.
Element `Flag.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.implicitRules`.
Element `Flag.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.language`.
Element `Flag.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.text`.
Element `Flag.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.contained`.
Element `Flag.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.identifier`.
Element `Flag.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.status`.
Element `Flag.category` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.category`.
Element `Flag.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.code`.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.subject`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Flag.subject` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Flag.subject` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.subject`.
Element `Flag.period` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.period`.
Element `Flag.encounter` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.encounter`.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.author`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Flag.author` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Flag.author` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Flag.author`.
